roleset.name: work towards a goal

example.name: positive campaign
example.text: Mr. Bush has long campaigned for passage of a bill or a constitutional amendment that would explicitly give him a line - item veto , which would enable him to kill individual items in a big spending bill without having to kill the entire bill .

propbank.arg: for passage of a bill or a constitutional amendment that would explicitly give him a line - item veto , which would enable him to kill individual items in a big spending bill without having to kill the entire bill

example.name: negative campaign
example.text: The government , campaigning against fixed brokerage commissions , promptly sued the CBOE over its minimum - fee system .

example.name: just arg1
example.text: I believe Eastwood is speaking from the heart , that 's why I think it 's such an amazing and curious ad since it looks and feels so much like the kind of thing the Obama campaign would find favorable to them .

example.name: both args
example.text: President Obama 's ? Campaign to Cut Waste ? Has Lackluster Prospects .

example.name: args TMP, 1 (as anti-cause)
example.text: SInce much of it lies in the mountainous regions of the West and southwest , these are already the subject of the new campaign against a resurfacing TAliban .

roleset.note: CAMPAIGN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'campaign' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from campaign.01-v predicate notes)
